Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory28.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Lucia... That's enough. If it was going to work, it would've worked already... We've lost contact with Liv.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...Let's turn around to find her immediately.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '(Peeks from your hiding place) The moment we entered this group of buildings, we had already alerted all the guards.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If we turn around now, we'll be facing an uphill battle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Lee... you're saying...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll go look for Liv. You stay here to protect Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I originally thought that Liv and Browning had successfully activated the distractor, and they had shut off their comms for technical reasons...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But seeing the number of guards here, I'm pretty sure there's no distraction device to begin with.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "(Holds up the device in his hand) This is the distractor we found on the enemy's body earlier, but it was busted long ago.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Even if we can contact Liv, there's no way we can lure the guards away for her with this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You were right about Browning. Something's wrong with him.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I only made my hypothesis based on the facts we had.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I had my suspicion when Browning recommended splitting us up.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Doesn't matter if Liv's in danger or not. The fact that she's with Browning right now is my responsibility.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'And now I must find her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm also responsible...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "(Looks at you) You have to stay with Commandant. My frame is not powerful enough to guarantee the commandant's safety.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I see... Our frames are different, aren't they? I'll leave Liv to you.", 4: '2'}
